thread.title: Dave Bird

author: Dave Bird
title: Dave Bird
text: The website is easy to use. I opted for a 2-hour slot and barely had I completed the order on-line than the phone rang to confirm the details and arrange the time slot. The operative was very knowledgable, checked all the tyres even though only one was being replaced and gave some very helpful advice re tracking and age deterioration of the rear tyres.
